main event: A driver and two passengers observed a bright, oblong-shaped light above Bald Eagle Ridge that exhibited unusual behaviors such as flashing, splitting into two lights, and gradually dimming and disappearing.
interesting points: The light was stationary at first, then began flashing very quickly, perhaps once or twice per second.
At one point, the light split into two separate lights, each appearing at the opposite ends of the original light.
The original light did not diminish in size or brightness during the splitting event.
After the flashing and splitting, the light began to slowly move away, increasing in distance while maintaining its altitude.
The observers were convinced the object was a UFO due to its unusual behaviors that did not resemble any known aircraft.
